name: monorepo-root
description: Root for the TypeScript pnpm workspace

scripts.clean: rm -rf .pnpm && find . -name tsconfig.tsbuildinfo -type f -exec rm -f {} + && find . -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name dist -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && echo "Workspace cleaned."
